title: Prerelease Mac OS X Snow Leopard DVD (Sealed!) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: Prerelease Mac OS X Snow Leopard DVD (Sealed!) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: You can support this channel on Patreon! Link below This copy of Mac OS X Snow Leopard is hard to find, especially in shrink-wrap! It's a 2009 developer preview, so let's open it up and take it for a spin!  See the iMac with internal Apple software   Download our epic wallpapers   Patreon!    Watch the Mac OS X tier list / history episode   Watch the macOS Ventura episode   Watch more Tech Misadventures!    Follow us on Twitter   Like us on Facebook   STICKERS (and more)   Hey! We're on Discord    Support the Computer Clan on Patreon   Patrons got early access to this episode and deleted scenes. They also got behind-the-scenes access, Discord VIP access, and their names in the credits! Pledge now to get those awesome perks, and help fund the future of the Computer Clan! Thanks for your support.   Contact Us    Get royalty-free stock footage with Artgrid. Sign up with my link to support the channel and get 2 extra months free:   I also use Artlist for the music in my videos. I highly recommend them  Click for 2 extra months free:   Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?    Computer Clan is an Amazon Associate. Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.  #KrazyKen #ComputerClan
